summary: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.
cast: Kurt Russell|Martin Short|Mary Kay Place|Benjamin Salisbury|Meadow Sisto|Sunshine Logroño|Jorge Luis Ramos|J.A. Preston|Tanya Soler|Raúl Estela|Jainardo Batista|Dan Butler|Tom McGowan|Katherine Franco|C.M. Talkington|Craig Rondell|Paul Anka|Shanti Kahn|Marty Eli Schwartz|John Scott Clough|Katherine Calzada|Diego de la Texera|Roselyn Sanchez|Janine Okada|Eliseo López|Gustavo Cerezo|Efrain 'Chico' Rosario|José Ciro|Silvestre Ramos González|Antonio Valdés Lazo|José Ángel Ortiz|Gustavo Rodríguez|Výktor Emilio Arce|Ralph Arrieta|James Dudley|David Canal|Edwin Delgado|Carlos Miranda|Gil Baldiris|Lani Bremer|Rolando D'Lugo|Isaac LaMell|Scott B. Valdes
title: Capitán Ron
